item.title: Determine missing required parameters
item.description: Frequently checking for required parameters is needed. Locating the missing parameters helps in creating a helpful message for the client. Test <?php declare(strict_types=1); namespace AppTest\Validator; use PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase; use function array_diff_key; use function array_flip; use function array_keys; class RequiredParameterTest extends TestCase { public function testGetMissingParameters(): void { $required = [ 'requiredParameterA', 'requiredParameterB', 'requiredParameterC', 'requiredParameterD', ]; $data = [ 'requiredParameterA' => 'foo', 'requiredParameterD' => null, ]; $missing = [ 'requiredParameterB', 'requiredParameterC', ]; $result = array_keys(array_diff_key(array_flip($required), $data)); $this->assertEquals($missing, $result); } } “Validator” <?
